resources.string: "Si te gusta Heriswap, dedica un momento a valorarlo. ¡Gracias por tu apoyo!"
"Activa Swarm para ver puntuaciones en línea!"
"Usted es muy bueno, quereis aumentar la difficultad ?"
"Aligning at least 3 identical leaves ×feuille1,1,1× ×feuille1,1,1× ×feuille1,1,1×.\n\nSwap 2 neighbouring leaves ×feuille2,1,1× ×feuille3,1,1× to create a combination and earn points."
"The ×herisson_2_5,2,1.6× shows how much time is left, and the game is over when it reaches screen's right edge. Tap him to get a hint!"
"The goal is to score the most points.\n\nGame is time limited."

"The ×feuille5,1,1× on its back scores bonus points.\n\nFor each successful combination extra time is added. The best way to earn lot of time is to complete a level. This is done by clearing the top branch of all its leaves."

"The goal is to remove all the leaves ×feuille2,1,1× from the tree as fast as possible.

This is done by aligning at least 3 identical leaves ×feuille1,1,1× ×feuille1,1,1× ×feuille1,1,1×.

Swap 2 neighbouring leaves ×feuille2,1,1× ×feuille3,1,1× to create a combination."
"The ×herisson_2_5,2,1.6× shows the progress. Game is finished when it reaches screen's right edge.\n\nEvery combination using bonus type leaves ×feuille5,1,1× score double."
"The goal is to score the most points in exactly 100 seconds."
